# Problem 1

## Data Import and Cleaning
```{r, "Loading in Data"}
subway_data = read_csv(file = "./data/NYC_Transit_Subway_Entrance_And_Exit_Data.csv")
```

```{r, "Cleaning up variable names"}
names(subway_data) 

subway_data = janitor::clean_names(subway_data)
names(subway_data)
```
```{r, "Selecting variables to keep, recoding entry variable"}
select(subway_data, "line", "station_name", "station_latitude", "station_longitude", starts_with("route"), "entry", "vending", "entrance_type", "ada")
```
